item.title: [Hired] Senior JS Engineers
item.description: We’re looking for senior JS developers for exciting products, using a mix of React (now with NextJS), TypeScript, RxJS, Vue, and even good old Node. We are a remote-first company! It means you are encouraged to work from anywhere that you enjoy the most. Whenever you feel like you need some human interaction, our crew in Saigon and Hanoi will be happy to see you. Who we are CoderPush is a studio of engineers and designers to collaborate with clients for great software, teams, and processes.

item.title: Why CoderPush!
item.description: Why join a young company instead of a big one? Because you can learn faster, make mistakes, share learning from mistakes, and have a personal impact on those around you. You shape how the company forms. Why a software studio instead of a product company? It’s like spending a few years at a training camp, for something that you love doing :) There should be more companies like ours in Vietnam, even South East Asia, but we don’t know many.

item.title: Ready to push üì©
item.description: Don’t just build features, but design the right product with the right strategy.

item.title: Purpose, Mission and Values.
item.description: CoderPush is a purpose-first business, formed to make an impact on our people and clients. Purpose We aim to become a world-class company in making engineers great and doing engineering well. Mission Thrive on an international experience for local engineers and world entrepreneurs to maximize learning, drive innovation and create possibilities. Values We take inspiration from other technology companies, especially remote ones. We are focusing on building a remote-first, Vietnam-first company.
